summary: A simple port of Gather Ye Rosebuds for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Changelog:
11 Aug 2012
------------------
Seems like I messed up updating the mod to support SKSE. For now I\'m removing that version until I get around to fixing it. Redownload the version 2 which doesn\'t require SKSE. 


23 May 2012
------------------
Uploaded a new version that requires SKSE 
It is super fast, almost instant. 
Added Green Thumb Perk bonus

Download SKSE from here: http://skse.silverlock.org/
------------------


*OLD version changelog, obsolete*


Added Butterflies and other critters, increased the radius to 10000

What: 
I searched the forums and database but couldnt\' find a port of the excellent mod Gather Ye Rosebuds which makes game much more enjoyable, at least for a few of us. So here is a very noobish attempt at replicating its functionality. 

Where:
The far bank beside Riverwood bridge have a corpse with the Spelltome that teaches you the spell. 

Titbits:
1. The loot radius is 10000 meter/units in skyrim world. 
2. The maximum amount of flora / single cast cannot be greater than 50 (I reached this value after much tweaking since increasing it to larger number makes the spell take unreasonably long. Its the limitation of the new scripting engine which allots limited resources to each script, nothing to do with the mod)
3. Even when there is less than 50 nodes to collect, the spell may not retrieve them all. Its a limitation of the bethesda API that I\'m using. 

Also, I would really appreciate any feedback, (even if it is on the line of GTFO your mod suckz) as long as it helps me improve the quality of the mod. Also please endorse and recommend if you think its useful.
author: fruitcake
